cosmic_ray_image = np.array([[False, False, False], [False, True, False], [
    False, False, False]])
mask = msk.Mask.from_cosmic_ray_image(shape=(3, 3), frame_geometry=ci_frame
    .FrameGeometry.euclid_bottom_left(), cosmic_ray_image=cosmic_ray_image)
assert (mask == np.array([[False, False, False], [False, True, False], [
    False, False, False]])).all()
